name: Last One Out
description:
The Blast Doors just need a bit more time to close! can you hold off hordes of enemies until they shut? Use various power ups, random gen cover, and buttons to aid in your survival. Buttons on the map will light up when ready and if pressed will speed up the door for a few seconds, but be warned, as doing so will redirect power from the overhead lights!

Cade Walsh: Level design, kitbashing, lighting, procedural generation.

Sam Lower: Gameplay programming, combat design, project compilation.

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1NLds3ZD456NA7mKg_QiPL9kngBtSZXH9/view?usp=sharing (in case the main download does not work)
